meanings.definition: To increase in size or quantity.
meanings.sent1: I upsized my drink at the restaurant for only a small fee.
meanings.sent2: She always upsized her popcorn at the movies to get a bigger portion.
meanings.sent3: The cat upsized its yawn when it saw the bird outside the window.
meanings.sent4: The balloon upsized as more air was blown into it, reaching a huge size.
meanings.sent5: The plant upsized its leaves after a week of receiving plenty of sunlight and water.

meanings.sent1: The upsized pizza was perfect for the party with all the guests.
meanings.sent2: The upsized car could fit the whole family comfortably for the road trip.
meanings.sent3: The upsized cake was so big that it barely fit in the fridge!
meanings.sent4: The upsized building towered over the rest of the neighborhood, standing out.
meanings.sent5: The upsized sweater was cozy and warm, perfect for the chilly weather.
